Uses of Package
edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.globalworkspace

Packages that use edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.globalworkspace
edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.actionselection Contains classes related to Action Selection, a subsystem which selects Behaviors for execution. 
edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.actionselection.behaviornetwork Contains classes related to the Behavior Network implementation of Action Selection. 
edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.attentioncodelets Contains classes related to Attention Codelets, these processes function to select and bring content to the GlobalWorkspace. 
edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.episodicmemory Contains classes defining Episodic Memory modules which store various kinds of Episodic Memories. 
edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.gui.panels Contains classes related to GuiPanels which can display content in the framework's GUI. 
edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.shared Contains classes related to the more common data structures used in the framework's modules. 
edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.globalworkspace Contains classes related to the GlobalWorkspace, the module responsible for selecting the most important part of the agent's current understanding, at the particular moment, for broadcast throughout the system. 
edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.globalworkspace.triggers Contains classes related to the triggering of the competition for the consciousness broadcast. 
edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.pam Contains classes related to the definition and implementation of the Perceptual Associative Memory module. 
edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.proceduralmemory Contains classes related to the definition and implementation of the Procedural Memory module. 
edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.workspace Contains classes related to the definition and implementation of the Workspace module. 
edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.workspace.workspaceBuffer Contains classes related to the definition and implementation of Workspace buffers. 
 

Classes in edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.globalworkspace used by edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.actionselection
BroadcastContent
          This is an abstract mark for Broadcast content.
BroadcastListener
          Modules that need to receive Broadcast must implement this interface.
